job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtat apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly imagine what you could do here bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtthe apple pay server team is a rare engineering group within apple we provide critical services for the company across every product line from manufacturing to customer facing our services span across the entire lifecycle of most apple hardware by crafting and implementing services that are tightly coupled with hardware we support the ongoing need to improve security of customers sensitive data financial or otherwise and privacy many of our services are seen in the ios security guide and are publicly discussed on internet forumsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt years experience in software development for distributed systemsltbrgtltbrgtdeep understanding of one or more programming languages ltbrgtltbrgtexperienced in designing ampamp developing highly scalable web applicationsltbrgtltbrgtdetailed knowledge of relational and nonrelational databasesltbrgtltbrgtexpertise in testdriven developmentltbrgtltbrgtoutstanding analytical and problem solving skills across large ecosystemsltbrgtltbrgtdemonstrated ability to think criticality and quickly learn new technologiesltbrgtltbrgtstrong communication collaboration ampamp interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtios and macos familiarity nice to haveltbrgtltbrgtexperience in payment industry andor identity management security ampamp cryptography nice to haveltbrgtltbrgtunderstands software development methodologiesltbrgtltbrgtproven track record of successful product deliveryltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtimagine the freedom of a startup with the funding and laser focus of the most valuable company in the world as an experienced software engineer on the apple pay server team ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt you will participate in initiatives that are essential to the success of upcoming product launches and product security initiativesltbrgtltbrgt you will get the opportunity to lead a small group of engineers working on product featuresltbrgtltbrgt you will develop the next generation of cloud support that powers apple payltbrgtltbrgt you will be responsible for designing and developing large scale platforms that can support future apple pay functionalityltbrgtltbrgt you will have the opportunity to explore and contribute to a wide range of technologiesltbrgtltbrgt you will work collaboratively with apples ios engineering team nfc team security team and external partners to define the next hot feature of apple payltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbs or ms in computer scienceengineering or equivalent practical experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtadditional requirementsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtapple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity we also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants including minorities women protected veterans and individuals with disabilities apple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about disclose or discuss their compensation or that of other applicantsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtwe promote innovation and new technology to further improve our creative output dynamic smart people and inspiring innovative
